Synonyms.Synonym: Minimally invasive direct coronary artery bypass

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Heart bypass surgery - minimally invasive
QAPair.Answer: Heart bypass surgery creates a new route, called a bypass, for blood and oxygen to reach your heart. Minimally invasive coronary (heart) artery bypass can be done without stopping the heart. Therefore, you do not need to be put on a heart-lung machine for this procedure.
